lead_paragraph: PLAYER In Spain, reports that Barcelona will sell Ronaldinho during the January transfer period were dismissed by the club’s president, Joan Laporta. “We are not going to sell Ronaldinho,” he told the news media before Sunday’s 2-1 win over Deportivo la Coruña. “We are not in contact with Chelsea, Milan or any other team.”.
